page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS - READERS LETTERS
page.content: Letters in our local papers seem to deal with the social problems in the local parishes and about vandalism and violence in our area.Other letters are about problems in the home,especially about problems with sons and daughters. National news is also discussed by the areas inhabitants.The latest teachers strike is debated in very great detail by people with children in secondary schools taking exams or doing exam coursework. Local elections are also discussed in great detail.As well as letters which discuss local news,there are many letters of gratitude and thanks from organisations and members of clubs for help and support.
